title: IMC Accelerator Framework
description: Open-source framework for designing and simulating in-memory computing accelerators. Includes cycle-accurate simulators and RTL generators.

title: RISC-V Core Collection
description: Collection of custom RISC-V processor cores with various extensions. Includes documentation, testbenches, and FPGA support.

title: Edge AI Toolkit
description: Tools for deploying neural networks on edge devices. Includes quantization, pruning, and optimization utilities.

title: Hardware-Aware NAS Benchmark
description: Benchmark dataset and evaluation framework for hardware-aware neural architecture search methods.

title: PQC Accelerator RTL
description: RTL implementation of post-quantum cryptography accelerators for Kyber and Dilithium algorithms.

title: In-Memory Computing Survey (PDF)
description: Comprehensive survey paper on in-memory computing architectures for machine learning applications.

title: RISC-V Tutorial Slides
description: Tutorial slides from our RISC-V workshop covering architecture basics, toolchain setup, and hands-on exercises.

title: DSP Cores Library
description: Reusable digital signal processing cores including FFT, FIR filters, and CORDIC implementations.

title: IMC Characterization Dataset
description: Measurement data from ReRAM and MRAM device characterization for in-memory computing research.

title: Lab Documentation Wiki
description: Internal documentation covering lab tools, workflows, and best practices. Useful for new lab members.
